column1: Kata Robata////Every sushi item was delicious
column2: but the uni stood out to me the most. Usually
column3: I am not a huge fan of uni sushi
column4: however I loved how CREAMY and sweet this uni was at kata robata. I didn't get to try the "premium" uni
column5: but I would like to try it next time if the second best uni was this great. Also
